players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie. He is the mafioso, not me. He is lying to save himself."

You: "I'm a villager, and I'm really confused. Charlie says Bob is the mafia, but Bob says he's the detective and Charlie is the mafia. Diana is dead, and we have no other information. This is tough."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and he is mafia. Bob is lying to try to save himself. Vote Bob out."
Bob: "I am the detective. Charlie is lying. I investigated him and he is mafia. Trust me, vote Charlie."

You: "This is incredibly difficult. Both Bob and Charlie claim to be the detective and accuse the other of being mafia. With Diana dead, we have no other information to go on. I don't know who to trust."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

Alice: "This is incredibly difficult. Both Bob and Charlie claim to be the detective and accuse the other of being mafia. With Diana dead, we have no other information to go on. I don't know who to trust."
